# Request Fields
| Key | Datatype | Required? | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| first_name | `STRING` | `true` | --- |
| middle_name | `STRING` | `false` | --- |
| last_name | `STRING` | `true`| --- |
| gender | `ENUM` ['MALE', 'FEMALE'] | `false` | --- |
| phone_country_code | `STRING` | `true` if phone number is supplied | ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Will be used to confirm validity of the phone number |
| phone_number | `STRING` | `false`| --- |
| country_code | `STRING` | `true` | ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code identifying the user's location |
